title: China Supports Iran In Defending "Sovereignty'' Amid Tensions With Israel
content: China supports Iran in defending its "sovereignty, security and national dignity", Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi told Iran's acting foreign minister in a phone call on Sunday, according to a statement by China's foreign ministry.
summary: China supports Iran in defending its "sovereignty, security and national dignity", Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi told Iran's acting foreign minister in a phone call on Sunday, according to a statement by China's foreign ministry.

title: Russian Army Hit Ukraine Troops Around 30 km Into Its Territory
content: Russia's army appeared to acknowledge Sunday that Ukrainian units had driven deep into the country, saying it had hit troops and equipment around 30 kilometres (20 miles) from the border.
summary: Russia's army appeared to acknowledge Sunday that Ukrainian units had driven deep into the country, saying it had hit troops and equipment around 30 kilometres (20 miles) from the border.

title: After Stabbing Incident, UK Schools' Move Against Extremist Online Content
content: The UK government said on Sunday schools in England could teach children how to spot extremist and online content spreading "putrid conspiracy theories", under planned changes to the national curriculum.
summary: The UK government said on Sunday schools in England could teach children how to spot extremist and online content spreading "putrid conspiracy theories", under planned changes to the national curriculum.

title: Playing With Ideas: Lawyer Of Suspect In Taylor Swift Concert Attack Plot
content: The lawyer of the main suspect in a foiled plot to carry out an attack at Taylor Swift concert in Vienna on Sunday sought to play down the seriousness of the plan, saying her client was only "playing with ideas".
summary: The lawyer of the main suspect in a foiled plot to carry out an attack at Taylor Swift concert in Vienna on Sunday sought to play down the seriousness of the plan, saying her client was only "playing with ideas".

title: "Can't Let You In...": Border Force Officer To Refugees From Bangladesh
content: A BSF officer is winning hearts for his calmness while explaining hundreds of Bangladesh refugees gathered at India's border why they cannot let them in.
summary: A BSF officer is winning hearts for his calmness while explaining hundreds of Bangladesh refugees gathered at India's border why they cannot let them in.

title: Thousands Of Ukrainian Troops On Incursion To 'Destabilise' Russia
content: Thousands of Ukrainian troops are taking part in an incursion aiming to destabilise Russia by showing up its weaknesses, a top Ukrainian official has told AFP as the assault entered its sixth day.
summary: Thousands of Ukrainian troops are taking part in an incursion aiming to destabilise Russia by showing up its weaknesses, a top Ukrainian official has told AFP as the assault entered its sixth day.

title: Sheikh Hasina's Son Thanks New Delhi For ''Saving Her Life''
content: The son of Bangladesh's toppled autocratic leader thanked New Delhi on Sunday for "saving her life", accused caretaker authorities of allowing "mob rule" and warned of chaos ahead without swift elections.
summary: The son of Bangladesh's toppled autocratic leader thanked New Delhi on Sunday for "saving her life", accused caretaker authorities of allowing "mob rule" and warned of chaos ahead without swift elections.

title: Bangladesh New Chief Justice Sworn In After Predecessor Quits Amid Protests
content: Bangladesh's new chief justice has been sworn into office after his predecessor, viewed as a loyalist of toppled premier Sheikh Hasina, quit following protester demands, a presidential official said Sunday.
summary: Bangladesh's new chief justice has been sworn into office after his predecessor, viewed as a loyalist of toppled premier Sheikh Hasina, quit following protester demands, a presidential official said Sunday.

title: NASA Shares Image Of Earth's Terminator: Here's What Causes This Phenomenon
content: The picture, taken from the International Space Station (ISS) orbiting 267 miles above the Pacific Ocean, shows the breathtaking moment when a new day dawns on our planet.
summary: The picture, taken from the International Space Station (ISS) orbiting 267 miles above the Pacific Ocean, shows the breathtaking moment when a new day dawns on our planet.

title: Philippines Slams China's "Illegal, Reckless" Actions Over Disputed Reef
content: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on Sunday condemned Chinese air force actions in waters of the South China Sea claimed by both countries, calling the actions "unjustified, illegal and reckless".
summary: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on Sunday condemned Chinese air force actions in waters of the South China Sea claimed by both countries, calling the actions "unjustified, illegal and reckless".

title: Sheikh Hasina's Undelivered Speech Had Big Charge Against US
content: Before she resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister and fled her Dhaka residence, Sheikh Hasina wanted to address the nation, especially the protesters whose agitation forced her to quit the top job.
summary: Before she resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister and fled her Dhaka residence, Sheikh Hasina wanted to address the nation, especially the protesters whose agitation forced her to quit the top job.

title: Olympic Dream Over, Rude Political Reality Likely Next For Emmanuel Macron
content: The success of the Olympic Games has surpassed the wildest dreams of many in France but in the next weeks, President Emmanuel Macron still will have to face the reality of the deadlocked politics created by his calling of snap legislative elections.
summary: The success of the Olympic Games has surpassed the wildest dreams of many in France but in the next weeks, President Emmanuel Macron still will have to face the reality of the deadlocked politics created by his calling of snap legislative elections.

title: Joe Biden Explains Why He Exited 2024 US Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden last month announced his exit from the 2024 presidential race amid growing concerns over his health.
summary: US President Joe Biden last month announced his exit from the 2024 presidential race amid growing concerns over his health.

title: Canada Man Sues YouTube, Meta, TikTok, Reddit For Being Too Addictive
content: The 24-year-old said that he began using social media in 2015 and experienced several problems with productivity and body image.
summary: The 24-year-old said that he began using social media in 2015 and experienced several problems with productivity and body image.

title: Kamala Harris Leads Donald Trump By 4 Points In 3 Swing States: Poll
content: With just three months to go for the US Presidential elections, Democratic nominee Kamala Harris has taken the lead over her Republican counterpart Donald Trump in three crucial swing states -- Wisconsin, Pennsylvania and Michigan.
summary: With just three months to go for the US Presidential elections, Democratic nominee Kamala Harris has taken the lead over her Republican counterpart Donald Trump in three crucial swing states -- Wisconsin, Pennsylvania and Michigan.

title: Ukraine Man, Son Die As Debris From Downed Russian Weapon Falls On House
content: A 4-year-old boy and his 35-year-old father died when debris from a downed Russian weapon fell on the house they were living in near the capital Kyiv, Ukrainian officials said on Sunday.
summary: A 4-year-old boy and his 35-year-old father died when debris from a downed Russian weapon fell on the house they were living in near the capital Kyiv, Ukrainian officials said on Sunday.

title: Celine Dion Slams Trump For "Unauthorised" Use Of 'Titanic' Song In His Rally
content: The statement added, "In no way is this use authorized, and Celine Dion does not endorse this or any similar use.... And really, THAT song?"
summary: The statement added, "In no way is this use authorized, and Celine Dion does not endorse this or any similar use.... And really, THAT song?"

title: Protesters Outside UK Parliament Condemn Violence Against Bangladeshi Hindus
content: A large crowd gathered outside the Houses of Parliament in London on Saturday to protest the alleged violence against minority Hindus and other groups in Bangladesh following the resignation and departure of former PM Sheikh Hasina earlier.
summary: A large crowd gathered outside the Houses of Parliament in London on Saturday to protest the alleged violence against minority Hindus and other groups in Bangladesh following the resignation and departure of former PM Sheikh Hasina earlier.

title: Bangladesh Hindus Protest Against Violence, Muhammad Yunus Responds
content: Hundreds of Hindus in Bangladesh are believed to have been injured in attacks on their homes and businesses since the fall of the Sheikh Hasina-led government on August 5.
summary: Hundreds of Hindus in Bangladesh are believed to have been injured in attacks on their homes and businesses since the fall of the Sheikh Hasina-led government on August 5.

title: UK 'Dine And Dash' Couple Leave Restaurant Without Paying Bill Worth 12,000
content: The couple, seen in a restaurant-released video, took an hour to eat their meal before leaving "for a cigarette," but they never came back.
summary: The couple, seen in a restaurant-released video, took an hour to eat their meal before leaving "for a cigarette," but they never came back.
